entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:36 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: ENE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow with ice pellets mixed with freezing rain except rain over southern sections. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 late this evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 17.
